results.text_hl: ...The use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has been generally considered a contraindication in @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure_Systolic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054143 @@@HFrEF@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ owing the potential risk of @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@; however, recent evidence has reported that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can provide beneficial effects in reducing the risk of incident HF and mortality in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.
